abstract: Vodafone has finally admitted it wants to buy Kabel Deutschland, Germany’s biggest cable operator, but John Malone, the pay-television magnate behind Liberty Global, may have something to say about it.
snippet: Vodafone has finally admitted it wants to buy Kabel Deutschland, Germany’s biggest cable operator, but John Malone, the pay-television magnate behind Liberty Global, may have something to say about it.
lead_paragraph: Vodafone’s ambitions in Germany could be undone by the king of cable.

headline.main: Malone May Play Role of Spoiler in Cable Deal
